scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Jonathan Maas
scrape.text: This is Mr. Koch’s hit, but since I read his latest first – Summer House with Swimming Pool, I’ll just say that this one does not disappoint. Though it’s doesn’t slap you from the first sentence like Summer House With Swimming Pool, it’s main twist in the middle knocks you for a loop.No spoilers here, but let’s just say that Mr. Koch finds a way to be as thrilling as Gillian Flynn, without her irresistible premises. That's not a backhanded compliment - it's a compliment. This book is about a couple having dinner, and you can't put it down.Regardless, this book invites you to the table, serves you a bottle of wine, and then leaves you breathless just as the appetizers are coming in.
